title: Bug 114470 [Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When trying to use 'new Date('3/2/2005')' as a value in a table filter, an error message is thrown. The error occurs on the report page.
OB: There are errors on the report page: There are error(s) in Table: table8, Error0 - data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s)), detail - An error happened in data type conversion. Can not convert it to Date. Can not convert it to Date.
EB: When using 'new Date('3/2/2005')' as a value in a table filter, there should be no errors. The filter should work without any issues.
SR:
To reproduce the bug: 
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column. 
2. Insert a table. 
3. Create a filter based on the datetime column. 
4. In the 'value1' field, input 'new Date('...')'. For example, 'new Date('3/2/2005')'.
